paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: ovary carcinoma at age of 42 years with retroperitoneal and lung metastasis, followed by TNBC at age 46
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Her personal history begins with an ovary carcinoma at age of 42 years with retroperitoneal and lung metastasis, to follow at 46 years old with a TNBC.

functional_data.summary: The variant is likely pathogenic based on its location and the patient's clinical history.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is associated with a significant family history of cancer.
key_quotes: Her personal history begins with an ovary carcinoma at age of 42 years with retroperitoneal and lung metastasis, to follow at 46 years old with a TNBC.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported in the paper.
